rules_data.heading: Objective
rules_data.description: Be the last player with cards remaining.

rules_data.heading: Setup
rules_data.description: Each player is dealt an equal number of cards from the deck.

rules_data.heading: Gameplay
rules_data.description: Players take turns playing cards into a central pile. If a "Slap" card is played, the next player must correctly "Eat" or "Drink" based on the "Slap" card's instruction or take the pile. If any player incorrectly slaps, eats, or drinks they must take the pile.

rules_data.heading: Card Types
rules_data.description: The deck consists of "Slap," "Eat," "Drink," and "Play" cards, each having different effects on gameplay.

rules_data.heading: Losing
rules_data.description: A player loses when they run out of cards.
